metadata.name: Right hand of the Japanese Crypto Craftsman
metadata.description:
What is expressed in this work is a fusion of traditional Japanese technology and future crypto technology. And the backgrounds incorporate the combined 2D and 3D style of mera's early work.
This NFT artwork comes with a 2.5D aluminum art panel produced by GASHO 2.0. The right to claim the actual artwork produced is included with the primary NFT bidder. Successful bidders will be contacted individually via Twitter, so please link your accounts in advance.
About GASHO 2.0
https://print.gasho2.com/
